name: Star Fugitives
description:
"Star Fugitives" is a small little game I made for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners 2" jam. It involves going around in space as a police spaceship to check on travelling spaceships's papers and shoot down fugitives.  

There's a special event at some point after checking many spaceships.

It was inspired by some nostalgic games for me such as "Space Invaders" and "Papers, Please".

I made only a Windows executable so it's only available on Windows right now.

Java is required to run the exe.
